Class Point

java.lang.Object
  




 class Point
extends java.lang.Object

A point class is represented as a pair of Cartesian coordinates. This class is not a part of Hieraecy but is going to be used by ohter classes. point x and y coordinates in the system.

Version:
1 Date 04/27/2014
